00012 // Check against redundant including
00013 #ifndef TT_PROCRASTINATE_H
00014 #define TT_PROCRASTINATE_H
00015 
00016 // Include appropriate headers
00017 #include "tt_audio_base.h"

00019 
00020 /********************************************************
00021         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00022 
00023         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00024  ********************************************************/
00025 
00026 class tt_procrastinate:public tt_audio_base{
00027 
00028         private:
00029                 enum constants{
00030                         k_num_temp_signals = 19,
00031                 };
00032                 tt_attribute_value              window_size_value[4];                           // size of the delay window
00033                 float                                   delay_low[4];
00034                 float                                   delay_high[4];
00035                 tt_attribute_value              shift_ratio_value[4];                           // amount of pitch shift
00036                 float                                   shift_low[4];
00037                 float                                   shift_high[4];
00038                 tt_attribute_value              gain_value[4];
00039                 float                                   gain_low[4];
00040                 float                                   gain_high[4];
00041                 tt_attribute_value              pan_value[4];
00042                 float                                   pan_low[4];
00043                 float                                   pan_high[4];
00044                 
00045                 tt_delay                                *delay1[4], *delay2[4];
00046                 tt_phasor                               *phasor[4];
00047                 tt_buffer_window                *wave1, *wave2;
00048                 tt_gain                                 *scale[4];
00049                 tt_offset                               *offset;
00050                 tt_onewrap                              *modulo;        
00051                 tt_mixer_mono                   *mixer[4];
00052                 tt_mixer_mono                   *finalmix;
00053                 tt_buffer                               *window;
00054                 
00055                 tt_pan                                  *panner[4];
00056                 tt_gain                                 *gain[4];
00057         
00058                 tt_audio_signal                 *temp[k_num_temp_signals];      // Temp Signals
00059                 float                                   buffersize_in_ms;
00060                         
00061         public:
00062                 enum selectors{                 // Attribute Selectors
00063                         k_ratio,
00064                         k_windowsize,
00065                         
00066                         k_gain_range,
00067                         k_shift_range,
00068                         k_pan_range,
00069                         k_delay_range,
00070                 };
00071                 
00072 
00073                 // OBJECT LIFE ************************************************************
00074                 tt_procrastinate()                                                                              // Constructor          
00075                 {
00076                         short i;
00077                         for(i=0; i < k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00078                                 temp[i] = new tt_audio_signal(vectorsize);              // allocate temp signals
00079                         
00080                         buffersize_in_ms = 10000.0;
00081                         
00082                         window = new tt_buffer(512);
00083                         wave1 = new tt_buffer_window(window);
00084                         wave2 = new tt_buffer_window(window);
00085                         offset = new tt_offset;
00086                         modulo = new tt_onewrap;        
00087                         finalmix = new tt_mixer_mono;
00088                         
00089                         for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00090                                 panner[i] = new tt_pan;
00091                                 gain[i] = new tt_gain;
00092                                 phasor[i] = new tt_phasor;
00093                                 scale[i] = new tt_gain;
00094                                 delay1[i] = new tt_delay(buffersize_in_ms);
00095                                 delay2[i] = new tt_delay(buffersize_in_ms);
00096                                 mixer[i] = new tt_mixer_mono;
00097                         }
00098                                 
00099                         // Set initial state
00100                         for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00101                                 mixer[i]->set_attr(tt_mixer_mono::k_master_gain, 0.0);
00102                                 mixer[i]->set_attr(tt_mixer_mono::k_channel_gain, 0, -0.0);
00103                                 mixer[i]->set_attr(tt_mixer_mono::k_channel_gain, 1, -0.0);
00104                         }
00105                         offset->set_attr(tt_offset::k_offset_value, 0.5);
00106                         window->fill(tt_buffer::k_padded_welch_512);
00107         
00108                         // Set initial ranges (0 sets all 4)
00109                         set_attr(k_gain_range, 0, -6.0, 0.0);
00110                         set_attr(k_pan_range, 0, 0.25, 0.75);
00111                         set_attr(k_shift_range, 0, 0.8, 1.2);
00112                         set_attr(k_delay_range, 0, 500.0, 2000.0);
00113                                 
00114                         finalmix->set_attr(tt_mixer_mono::k_master_gain, 0.0);
00115                         for(i=0; i<4; i++)
00116                                 finalmix->set_attr(tt_mixer_mono::k_channel_gain, i, 0.0);
00117                                 
00118                         // Default Settings
00119                         for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00120                                 window_size_value[i] = 10000;
00121                                 shift_ratio_value[i] = 1.0;
00122                                 //set_attr(k_ratio, i, 1.0);
00123                                 //set_attr(k_windowsize, i, 1000.0f);
00124                         }
00125                         
00126                         randomize_parameters();
00127                 }
00128 
00129                 ~tt_procrastinate()                                                                     // Destructor
00130                 {
00131                         short i;
00132                         
00133                         delete wave1;
00134                         delete wave2;
00135                         delete offset;
00136                         delete modulo;
00137                         delete window;
00138                         delete finalmix;
00139 
00140                         for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00141                                 delete panner[i];
00142                                 delete gain[i];
00143                                 delete phasor[i];
00144                                 delete scale[i];
00145                                 delete delay1[i];
00146                                 delete delay2[i];
00147                                 delete mixer[i];
00148                         }
00149         
00150                         // FREE THE TEMP SIGNALS
00151                         for(i=0; i<k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00152                                 delete temp[i];
00153                 }
00154 
00155 
00156                 // ATTRIBUTES ************************************************************
00157                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, short index, tt_attribute_value val)     // Set Attributes
00158                 {
00159                         switch(sel){
00160                                 case k_ratio:
00161                                         shift_ratio_value[index] = val;
00162                                         phasor[index]->set_attr(tt_phasor::k_frequency, (-(shift_ratio_value[index] - 1.0)) * (1.0 / (window_size_value[index] * 0.001)));
00163                                         break;
00164                                 case k_windowsize:
00165                                         window_size_value[index] = clip(val, 1.0f, buffersize_in_ms - 1);
00166                                         scale[index]->set_attr(tt_gain::k_gain_direct, window_size_value[index]);
00167                                         set_attr(k_ratio, index, shift_ratio_value[index]);                             // update the phasor freq based on the new window size
00168                                         break;
00169 
00170                         }
00171                 }
00172                 
00173                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, short index, tt_attribute_value low, tt_attribute_value high)    // Set Attributes
00174                 {
00175                         switch(sel){
00176                                 case k_gain_range:
00177                                         if(index != 0){
00178                                                 gain_low[index-1] = low;
00179                                                 gain_high[index-1] = high;
00180                                         }
00181                                         else{
00182                                                 short i;
00183                                                 for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00184                                                         gain_low[i] = low;
00185                                                         gain_high[i] = high;
00186                                                 }
00187                                         }                               
00188                                         break;
00189                                 case k_shift_range:
00190                                         if(index != 0){
00191                                                 shift_low[index-1] = low;
00192                                                 shift_high[index-1] = high;
00193                                         }
00194                                         else{
00195                                                 short i;
00196                                                 for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00197                                                         shift_low[i] = low;
00198                                                         shift_high[i] = high;
00199                                                 }
00200                                         }                               
00201                                         break;
00202                                 case k_pan_range:
00203                                         if(index != 0){
00204                                                 pan_low[index-1] = low;
00205                                                 pan_high[index-1] = high;
00206                                         }
00207                                         else{
00208                                                 short i;
00209                                                 for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00210                                                         pan_low[i] = low;
00211                                                         pan_high[i] = high;
00212                                                 }
00213                                         }                               
00214                                         break;
00215                                 case k_delay_range:
00216                                         if(index != 0){
00217                                                 delay_low[index-1] = low;
00218                                                 delay_high[index-1] = high;
00219                                         }
00220                                         else{
00221                                                 short i;
00222                                                 for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00223                                                         delay_low[i] = low;
00224                                                         delay_high[i] = high;
00225                                                 }
00226                                         }                       
00227                                         break;
00228                         }
00229                 }
00230 
00231                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel, short index)                               // Get Attributes
00232                 {
00233                         switch(sel){
00234                                 case k_ratio:
00235                                         return shift_ratio_value[index-1];
00236                                 case k_windowsize:
00237                                         return window_size_value[index-1];
00238                                 default:
00239                                         return -1;
00240                         }
00241                 }
00242                 
00243                 void randomize_parameters()
00244                 {
00245                         short   i;
00246                         float   tempval[4];
00247                         
00248                         for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00249                                 tempval[i] = gain_high[i] - gain_low[i];
00250                                 tempval[i] = gain_low[i] + (tempval[i] * (rand() / float(RAND_MAX)));
00251                                 mixer[i]->set_attr(tt_mixer_mono::k_master_gain, tempval[i]);
00252 //post("gain[%i]: %f", i, tempval[i]);                          
00253                                 tempval[i] = pan_high[i] - pan_low[i];
00254                                 tempval[i] = pan_low[i] + (tempval[i] * (rand() / float(RAND_MAX)));
00255                                 panner[i]->set_attr(tt_pan::k_position, tempval[i]);
00256 //post("pan[%i]: %f", i, tempval[i]);                           
00257 
00258                                 tempval[i] = shift_high[i] - shift_low[i];
00259                                 tempval[i] = shift_low[i] + (tempval[i] * (rand() / float(RAND_MAX)));
00260                                 set_attr(k_ratio, i, tempval[i]);
00261 //post("shift[%i]: %f", i, tempval[i]);                         
00262 
00263                                 tempval[i] = delay_high[i] - delay_low[i];
00264                                 tempval[i] = delay_low[i] + (tempval[i] * (rand() / float(RAND_MAX)));
00265                                 set_attr(k_windowsize, i, tempval[i]);
00266 //post("delay[%i]: %f", i, tempval[i]);                         
00267                         }               
00268                 }
00269                 
00270                 
00271                 /*****************************************************
00272                  * DSP LOOPS
00273                  *****************************************************/
00274                 // Because this is a meta-object, it is the user of this object who is responsible for making sure that
00275                 //      the vectorsize of the signals are the same as that of this object.
00276 
00277                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00278                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00279                 {
00280                         // VOICE 1 *****************
00281                         phasor[0]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0]);                                            // phasor~
00282                         scale[0]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);                            // *~ 87.0
00283                         delay1[0]->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[1], temp[8]);                       // blue.delai~
00284 //post("VOICE 1a: phasor=%f, scale=%f", *temp[0], *temp[1]);
00285 
00286                         offset->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);                                      // +~ 0.5
00287                         modulo->dsp_vector_calc(temp[1], temp[2]);                                      // %~ 1.0
00288                         scale[0]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[3]);                            // *~ 87.0
00289                         delay2[0]->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[3], temp[9]);                       // blue.delay~ (the second one)
00290 //post("VOICE 1b: phasor=%f, mod=%f, scale=%f", *temp[1], *temp[2], *temp[3]);
00291                         
00292                         wave1->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[8], temp[6]);                      // apply the window
00293                         wave2->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[9], temp[7]);                      // apply the window
00294                         
00295                         mixer[0]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[6], temp[7], temp[9]);           // combine the windowed delays and apply the gain control
00296                         panner[0]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[10], temp[11]);        
00297 
00298 
00299                         // VOICE 2 *****************
00300                         phasor[1]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0]);                                                    // phasor~
00301                         scale[1]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);                            // *~ 87.0
00302                         delay1[1]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[1], temp[8]);  // blue.delai~
00303 
00304                         offset->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);                                      // +~ 0.5
00305                         modulo->dsp_vector_calc(temp[1], temp[2]);                                      // %~ 1.0
00306                         scale[1]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[3]);                            // *~ 87.0
00307                         delay2[1]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[3], temp[18]);                 // blue.delay~ (the second one)
00308                         
00309                         wave1->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[8], temp[6]);              // apply the window
00310                         wave2->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[18], temp[7]);             // apply the window
00311                         
00312                         mixer[1]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[6], temp[7], temp[9]);   // combine the windowed delays and apply the gain control
00313                         panner[1]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[12], temp[13]);        
00314 
00315 
00316                         // VOICE 3 *****************
00317                         phasor[2]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0]);                                            // phasor~
00318                         scale[2]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);                            // *~ 87.0
00319                         delay1[2]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[1], temp[8]);          // blue.delai~
00320 
00321                         offset->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);                                      // +~ 0.5
00322                         modulo->dsp_vector_calc(temp[1], temp[2]);                                      // %~ 1.0
00323                         scale[2]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[3]);                            // *~ 87.0
00324                         delay2[2]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[3], temp[18]);         // blue.delay~ (the second one)
00325                         
00326                         wave1->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[8], temp[6]);                      // apply the window
00327                         wave2->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[18], temp[7]);                     // apply the window
00328                         
00329                         mixer[2]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[6], temp[7], temp[9]);           // combine the windowed delays and apply the gain control
00330                         panner[2]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[14], temp[15]);        
00331 
00332 
00333                         // VOICE 4 *****************
00334                         phasor[3]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0]);                                            // phasor~
00335                         scale[3]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);                            // *~ 87.0
00336                         delay1[3]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[1], temp[8]);          // blue.delai~
00337 
00338                         offset->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1]);                                      // +~ 0.5
00339                         modulo->dsp_vector_calc(temp[1], temp[2]);                                      // %~ 1.0
00340                         scale[3]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[3]);                            // *~ 87.0
00341                         delay2[3]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[3], temp[18]);         // blue.delay~ (the second one)
00342                         
00343                         wave1->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[8], temp[6]);                      // apply the window
00344                         wave2->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[18], temp[7]);                     // apply the window
00345                         
00346                         mixer[3]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[6], temp[7], temp[9]);           // combine the windowed delays and apply the gain control
00347                         panner[3]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[9], temp[16], temp[17]);        
00348                         
00349                         finalmix->dsp_vector_calc(temp[10], temp[12], temp[14], temp[16], out1);
00350                         finalmix->dsp_vector_calc(temp[11], temp[13], temp[15], temp[17], out2);
00351                 }
00352

00354 
00355         public:
00356                 // ADDITIONAL METHODS ************************************************************
00357                 
00358                 // clear
00359                 void clear()
00360                 {
00361                         short i;
00362                         for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00363                                 delay1[i]->clear();
00364                                 delay2[i]->clear();
00365                         }
00366                 }
00367                 
00368                 // set sample-rate (override the inherited method)
00369                 void set_sr(int value)
00370                 {
00371                         short i;
00372                         
00373                         if(value != sr){
00374                                 sr = value;
00375                                 r_sr = 1.0 / value;
00376                                 m_sr = sr * 0.001;
00377 
00378                                 wave1->set_sr(sr);
00379                                 wave2->set_sr(sr);
00380                                 offset->set_sr(sr);
00381                                 modulo->set_sr(sr);
00382                                 window->set_sr(sr);
00383                                 finalmix->set_sr(sr);
00384 
00385                                 for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00386                                         panner[i]->set_sr(sr);
00387                                         gain[i]->set_sr(sr);
00388                                         phasor[i]->set_sr(sr);
00389                                         scale[i]->set_sr(sr);
00390                                         delay1[i]->set_sr(sr);
00391                                         delay2[i]->set_sr(sr);
00392                                         mixer[i]->set_sr(sr);
00393                                 }
00394                         }
00395                 }
00396 
00397                 // set the vector size (override the inherited method)
00398                 void set_vectorsize(int value)
00399                 {
00400                         short i;
00401                         if(value != vectorsize){
00402                                 vectorsize = value;
00403 
00404                                 wave1->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00405                                 wave2->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00406                                 offset->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00407                                 modulo->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00408                                 window->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00409                                 finalmix->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00410 
00411                                 for(i=0; i<4; i++){
00412                                         panner[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00413                                         gain[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00414                                         phasor[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00415                                         scale[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00416                                         delay1[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00417                                         delay2[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00418                                         mixer[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00419                                 }
00420                         
00421                                 // RESIZE THE TEMP SIGNALS
00422                                 for(i=0; i<k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00423                                         temp[i]->alloc(vectorsize);
00424                         }
00425                 }
00426 };
